Line.body: New Line.${1:name}  bus1=${2:bus1}  bus2=${3:bus2} linecode=${4:X}  phases=${5:3}  length=${6:1}  units=${7:kft}

Line with geometry.body: New Line.${1:name}  bus1=${2:bus1}  bus2=${3:bus2} geometry=${4:X}  phases=${5:3}  length=${6:1}  units=${7:kft}

Line code.body: New LineCode.${1:name} nphases=${2:3} R1=$3 X1=$4 R0=$5 X0=$6 c1=$7 c0=$8 units=${9:kft} baseFreq=${10:60} normamps=$11

Load.body: New Load.$1  phases=${2:1}  bus1=$3  kv=${4:0.24}  kW=$5  pf=$6 status=${7:variable} model=${8:4} CVRwatts=${9:0.6} CVRvars=${10:3} Class=${11:1} yearly=${12:Residential} conn=${13:wye}

Transformer.body:
New  Transformer.${1:name}  phases=${2:3}  windings=${3:2}
~ Xhl=${4:2.0}   Xht=${5:2.0}   Xlt=${6:1.4}  %noloadloss=${7:0.2}
~ buses=[${8}]
~ kVs=[${9:12.47  .12}]     ! ratings of windings
~ kVAs=[${10:25 25}]
~ %Rs = [${11:0.6  1.2}]
~ conns=[${12:delta wye}]
